texts.value: This is a receptor for GIP. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins which activate adenylyl cyclase
May form homodimers and heterodimers with GLP1R
N-glycosylation is required for cell surface expression and lengthens receptor half-life by preventing degradation in the ER
Belongs to the G-protein coupled receptor 2 family

The status, quality, and expansion of the NIH full-length cDNA project: the Mammalian Gene Collection (MGC).
Regulation of GIP and GLP1 receptor cell surface expression by N-glycosylation and receptor heteromerization.
Crystal structure of the incretin-bound extracellular domain of a G protein-coupled receptor.
